welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Mountsorrel! This charming town in the heart of the United Kingdom is known for its beautiful landscapes and rich history. We invite you to immerse yourself in its beauty and discover all that Mountsorrel has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at East Midlands Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost and holiday flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Nottingham Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cottesmore RAF Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Cottesmore RAF Airport is used exclusively for military operations.

wifi.note: WiFi is available in all public areas of the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for all domestic and international flights at West Midlands International Airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a password or registration.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Birmingham Airport handles both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal is primarily used by low-cost carriers and handles both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal is primarily used by full-service airlines and handles both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.
